ios.NSCameraUsageDescription: KindWorld needs access to your camera to take profile photos and upload mission images.
ios.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: KindWorld needs access to your photo library to select profile photos and mission images.
ios.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: KindWorld uses your location to show nearby volunteer missions and events.

review_notes.special_instructions: The app requires Firebase backend services. Test account is pre-populated with sample missions and points for review purposes. Location permissions are optional but enhance the mission discovery experience.
